doc:
Herbert Heyes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Heyes 0 Herbert Heyes (August 3, 1889 – May 31, 1958) was an American film actor. He appeared in nearly 100 films between 1915 and 1956, including the famed 1947 film Miracle on 34th Street, in which he played an ahistorical "Mr. Gimbel," owner of Gimbel's Department Store. He was born in Vader, Washington and died in North Hollywood, California. Herbert_Heyes ( August_3_,_1889 – May_31_,_1958 ) was an_American_film_actor . He appeared in nearly_100_films between 1915_and_1956 , including the_famed_1947_film_Miracle on 34th_Street , in which he played an_ahistorical_"_Mr._Gimbel , "_owner of Gimbel 's_Department_Store . He was_born in Vader , Washington and died in North_Hollywood , California .
